200802.n: Advanced Topics in Cultural Studies I

201002.n: Advanced Topics in Cultural Studies I

201201.n: Advanced Topics in Cultural Studies I

201202.n: Advanced Topics in Cultural Studies I

catList: This course addresses current issues in the field of Cultural Studies at a level appropriate for graduate students and advanced undergraduates. The specific focus of the course will be announced each semester that it is offered. Topics and approaches may be drawn from anthropology, history, literature, sociology or visual studies.
